actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to postpone the date required for adoption and submission of State implementation plans for areas which have failed to attain national ambient air quality standards, to postpone the date required for attainment of such standards, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Nonattainment Area Postponement Act of 1980 - Amends the Clean Air Act to postpone by three years the dates required for: (1) adoption and submission of State implementation plans for areas which have failed to attain national air quality standards; and (2) attainment of such standards. Amends the Clean Air Act Amendments of 1977 to make conforming amendments.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to postpone the date required for adoption and submission of State implementation plans for areas which have failed to attain national ambient air quality standards, to postpone the date required for attainment of such standards, and for other purposes.
